title: UwU Translator Bot
snippet: A Discord Bot that translates any sentence into its UwU and OwO form.UwU Translator Bot is a discord bot written in Python with discord.py module.This bot is available on top.gg.Links GitHub Top.ggImages

title: Image To Text Renderer
snippet: The Image To Text Renderer is an app made to transform any image into text.It resizes any image to any given width andconverts each pixels to a character based on its darkness.It doesnâ€™t feature a working GUI at the moment.Links GitHubImages

title: Project Euler
snippet: This repository is open to anyone interested in solving the Project Euler problems.I started this project in December 2021 in order to enhancemy computing and mathematical skills.Links GitHubImages

title: Codewars
snippet: This repository is open to anyone interested in solving Codewars katas.I started this project in January 2022 in order to enhancemy computing and mathematical skills as well.Links GitHubImages

title: Steam Market Calculator
snippet: The Steam Market Calculator is a small yet very useful programwith a simple GUI made for calculations in the Steam Market.I have simplified three of the most common calculations made on the Steam Market.Links GitHubImages

title: Heart Attack
snippet: Heart Attack is a top-down 2D shooter where you mustprotect your heart from the forces of evil.I developed this game in March 2021 as my first PC game using Unity,I later published it on Itch.io.Links Itch.ioImages

title: Retrowave
snippet: Retrowave is a minimalist driving game set in a retro environment.I developed this game in June 2020 as my first Mobile game using Unity,I then published it on the Play Store and it has over 1000 downloads.Links Play StoreImages

title: ThroneRoom
snippet: ThroneRoom is a simple medieval game about resource management.I developed it when I started learning Python in April 2020and I have continuously seeked to improve it.Links GitHubImages
